articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of New Ground-to-Sea Cruise Rocket
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of New Ground-to-Sea Cruise Rocket
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un supervised a test-fire of new-type ground-to-sea cruise rocket developed by the Academy of National Defence Science.
					 This new-type cruise rocket is a powerful attack means capable of striking any enemy group of battleships attempting at military attack on the DPRK from the ground at will.
					
					 The test-fire was aimed to confirm its tactical and engineering data and technical specifications and verify the combat application efficiency of the overall weapon system, including the rocket and caterpillar self-propelled launching pad vehicle.
					
					 At the observation post, Kim Jong Un learned about the tactical and engineering data of the rocket and ordered the start of its test-fire.
					
					 The launched cruise rockets accurately detected and hit the floating targets on the East Sea of Korea after making circular flights.
					
					 The test-fire verified such specifications as separation of rocket from the tube of caterpillar self-propelled launching pad vehicle, start-up of engines and rapid admission into zero-feet flight. And it examined the flying safety under the zero-feet long-distance cruise flight system, mobility in various flying courses, accuracy of target sensing and guidance by the complex guided head, identification ability and sharp transition to attitude at the time of advance into the target.
					
					 During the launching preparation process, such specifications were also examined and confirmed as the mobility and entry into combatant position of newly-developed caterpillar self-propelled launching pad vehicle, rapid firing preparation and reliability of operation of the launching and controlling systems.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly appreciated the officials, scientists and technicians of the academy for having successfully developed and test-fired the new-type ground-to-sea cruise rocket to which the Party attaches importance.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Jong Sik and Jong Sung Il.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Clarifies Principled Stand at 35th Session of UN Human Rights Council
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Clarifies Principled Stand at 35th Session of UN Human Rights Council
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK clarified the following principled stand at the 35th Session of the UN Human Rights Council in Geneva on Wednesday over the vicious "human rights" racket of the hostile forces against the DPRK:
					 The U.S. and its followers openly seek to bring down the social system of the DPRK under the pretext of non-existent "human rights issue", adopting an anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" every year at the UN Human Rights Council.
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" and the "special rapporteur" of the UN concerning the human rights performance in the DPRK who appeared according to the "resolution" are just the typical product of the politicization of the human rights issue, and selectivity and double standards being applied in handling it. The DPRK is consistent in its stand of categorically rejecting it.
					
					 The DPRK is a socialist country centered on the popular masses, where they are the master of everything and everything serves them.
					
					 The government of the DPRK set it as its state policy to protect and promote the human rights of its people and makes every possible effort for its implementation.
					
					 It is the true situation of the DPRK that all the people are enjoying the genuine human rights to the full.
					
					 This being a hard fact, some countries are calling for cooperation with the above-said UN "special rapporteur". This interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK can never be justified.
					
					 The DPRK is practically doing its best in the field of human rights and calls for cooperation and dialogue for protecting and promoting the genuine human rights.
					
					 It acceded to the convention on the rights of the child, the convention on the elimination of all forms of discrimination against women and other major international human rights conventions. Specifically, it signed the convention on the rights of persons with disabilities in November last year.
					
					 The DPRK submitted to the UN its reports on the implementation of the above-said conventions in the first half of the last year. It is proactively conducting the preparatory work for having them checked in September and November this year.
					
					 In May it invited the special rapporteur concerning the rights of the disabled to Pyongyang as part of its efforts for implementing the convention on the rights of persons with disabilities, candidly and deeply discussed the issues for implementing the convention with her and reached an agreement to further strengthen the cooperative ties.
					
					 The Office of the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights also positively appreciated her visit.
					
					 The DPRK rejects any "human rights argument" and "cooperation" extremely politicized on the basis of "testimonies" made by the criminals and human scum like "defectors from the north." But it is its stand to positively respond to any dialogue and cooperation for promoting the genuine human rights.
					
					 If the UN Human Rights Council is to fulfill the duty and mission peculiar to it, it should take issue with the poor human rights situation of the world's worst human rights abusers like the U.S. and other Western countries, the hideous past crimes of Japan, the unheard-of group abduction of DPRK women citizens by south Korea and other institutional human rights abuses, and take steps for tackling them.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the "human rights" racket of the hostile forces over its non-existent "human rights issue" but toughly counter it to the end.

articles.title: FM Working Delegation of DPRK Visits Ethiopia
articles.content:
FM Working Delegation of DPRK Visits Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A working delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry headed by General Director Ho Yong Bok recently visited the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia.
					 During the visit, the delegation paid a courtesy call on the state minister for Political Affairs of the Ethiopian Foreign Ministry and separately met the state minister of Public Enterprise and the director general for Asia and Oceania of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 At the meetings the DPRK side reaffirmed the stand of the DPRK to further strengthen the relations between the two countries and briefed on its pro-active efforts to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula and guarantee peace and security of the region.
					
					 Hirut Zemene, state minister for Political Affairs of the Foreign Ministry, and other heavyweights of Ethiopia appreciated that the DPRK is protecting its sovereignty and achieving miraculous successes in the drive for economic development despite the toughest sanctions and pressure of the hostile forces and making pro-active efforts for peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region. They stated that it is the consistent stand of the Ethiopian government to further develop the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries with a long tradition.
					
					 Both sides agreed to reenergize visits and contacts of delegations, exchanges and cooperation in politics, economy and all other fields for boosting the favorably developing bilateral relations.

articles.title: U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Global Environmental Pollution: Researcher of DPRK Institute for International Studies
articles.content:
U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Global Environmental Pollution: Researcher of DPRK Institute for International Studies
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Kum Hui, a researcher of the Institute for International Studies of the DPRK, Friday released an article titled "The U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Global Environmental Pollution".
					 Noting the U.S. is making no scruple of indiscriminately polluting the global environment against the present trend of times amid the ever-growing attention paid by the world public to preventing the global warming, the article said:
					
					 The U.S. became the world's biggest greenhouse gas emitting nation in the first half of the 20th century when it introduced massive consumption and massive dumping into its economy.
					
					 Since the end of the Cold War, it has facilitated the environmental pollution worldwide by forcing the American-style development "model" on many developing countries under signboard of "globalization" of economy.
					
					 The amount of greenhouse gas, emitted in the U.S., increased by 16 percent in the years between 1990 and 2005. It reached the 22.1 percent of the total global amount in 2004.
					
					 The U.S. used A-bombs against mankind for the first time. Since then, it conducted more than a thousand nuclear tests until the early 1990s to spoil the Ozone layer serving as an umbrella protecting the lives on the earth.
					
					 Actually, the earth is exposed to the danger of being reduced to a desert hit by radioactive pollution due to the armed intervention being perpetrated by the U.S. across the world under the pretext of "combating terrorism."
					
					 During the Iraqi war in 2003 the U.S. used 100 to 200 tons of depleted uranium shells seriously affecting human health and the environment.
					
					 Under the pretext of striking positions of the "Islamic State" it used 5 265 30mm-caliber armor-piercing depleted uranium shells in Syria in 2015.
					
					 The U.S., which massively used bio-chemical weapons during the Korean War in the 1950s and the Vietnamese War in the 1960s, is stepping up its preparations for bio-chemical warfare which will bring doom to the earth in the 21st century, too.
					
					 The U.S. conducted anthrax germ test at its Osan Air Force Base in south Korea in 2015. It is said that its destructive power reaches 95 percent and causes terrible pollution destruction. It is actually operating bio-warfare bases masked as "bioengineering labs" across the world.
					
					 Land and water pollution, caused by the leakage of waste oil, chemicals and heavy metals from thousands of U.S. military bases in 140 odd countries in the world, is very serious. This evil cycle of environmental pollution is a terrible disaster eclipsing the damage caused by the economic activities of mankind.
					
					 The U.S. has deliberately added to the environmental destruction by disturbing the worldwide efforts for preventing the global warming.
					
					 After its emergence, the present Trump administration has withdrawn a series of restrictive measures for preventing the global warming. It took such reckless action as withdrawing from the Paris Agreement on June 1.
					
					 Its mishandling of solutions to global warming is aimed to provide the greatest interests to the energy monopolies and military industrial complexes in the U.S. which invested it with power and continue backing it.
					
					 All facts clearly show that the U.S. is not only a ringleader which spawned global warming threatening the human existence and future of the earth but the enemy of mankind driving into an irretrievably catastrophic consequences by disturbing even the worldwide efforts to prevent it.
					
					 If the U.S. continues swimming against the trend of the times protecting the global environment, it will not escape from the stern judgment of mankind.

articles.title: Condolatory Visits to Iranian Embassy
articles.content:
Condolatory Visits to Iranian Embassy
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of External Economic Relations, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps in the DPRK Friday paid condolatory visits to the Iranian embassy here with regard to the recent terrorist attacks in Teheran that claimed heavy casualties.
					 The visitors expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the victims of the incidents and their bereaved families and reiterated the consistent principled stand of the DPRK government against all forms of terrorism.

articles.title: National Day of Russia Observed
articles.content:
National Day of Russia Observed
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday to mark the national day of Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations, Sin Hong Chol, O Yong Chol, So Ho Won, Mun Jae Chol and other officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 On the same day the Russian consulate general in Chongjin, too, gave a reception.

articles.title: Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification
articles.content:
Members of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Visit Monument to Three Charters for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), and its staff members visited the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification on Friday on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 They went round the tower and group of subsidiary theme sculptures, being briefed on the fact that the monument was successfully built, reflecting the Koreans' will to convey to posterity the great leaders' feats for national reunification and usher in a new era of independent reunification under the banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Party Information Workers Tour Areas of Rimyongsu and Taehongdan
articles.content:
Party Information Workers Tour Areas of Rimyongsu and Taehongdan
 Taehongdan, June 9 (KCNA) -- The expedition of party information workers for study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu went round the areas of Rimyongsu and Taehongdan.
					 On June 8, they visited the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Chongbong, Konchang and Begaebong bivouacs and the revolutionary battle site in the Dam No. 5.
					
					 They went round revolutionary mementoes including the site where anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk boiled rice, campfire and slogan-bearing trees.
					
					 On June 9, they toured the Mupho Bivouac where President Kim Il Sung camped in May Juche 28 (1939) by leading the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and set forth militant task to advance into the area of Taehongdan and the Mupho Angling Site where leader Kim Jong Il matured a plan to model the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					
					 They toured the Taehongdan Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers at the statue of the President in the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area. Then they looked round the command post of the battle of Taehongdan, etc.
					
					 At the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site, they deeply grasped the feats performed by the President to arise all Koreans to the nationwide resistance against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 On the evening of the day, they had a field meeting at the campfire to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas.

articles.title: Samjiyon Band Gives Performance in Hyesan
articles.content:
Samjiyon Band Gives Performance in Hyesan
 Hyesan, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave a performance in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province from June 5 to 9 to mark the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Enjoying the performance were officials, working people and school youth and children in the province and visitors to the revolutionary battle fields in the area of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Put on the stage, which began with prelude "Song of the Revolutinary Army, were such numbers as female sextet "Pochonbo, Land of Glory", serial songs of the guerilla army, instrumental music and song "Yanji Bomb", male quintet "Mother Is Always with Red Flag" and female solo and male pangchang "Everlasting Echo".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by leading a great war against the Japanese imperialist aggressors to victory.

articles.title: Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championship Opens
articles.content:
Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championship Opens
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The National Juvenile Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Friday.
					 The championship brings together players selected from Pyongyang and all provinces, the Taekwon-Do team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee and other units. Taekwon-do and Paduk competitions will take place at the Holy Taekwon-Do Hall.
					
					 Attending the opening ceremony were officials concerned, players and coaches and school youth and children.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a demonstration of players from the Taekwon-Do team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee.

articles.title: Works for Road Construction and Improvement Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Works for Road Construction and Improvement Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to the technological improvement and construction of roads across the DPRK in recent years.
					 Last year, South Hamgyong Province carried out the project for filling earth of 100,000 cubic meters and excavating bedrock and earth of 400,000 cubic meters to improve roads extending 80-odd kilometers.
					
					 And Machon Pass Tunnel was completed by the devoted efforts of the residents in North and South Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 Since the beginning of this year, Kanggye City of Jagang Province and Sepho County of Kangwon Province are undertaking the projects for expansion of the width of roads, adjustment of roadbeds, masonry and revetment, thus ensuring the flatness and safety of roads.
					
					 Meanwhile, Chollima District of Nampho City laid stones along the main roads and Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province repaired 100-km-long roads.

articles.title: Han Jong Sim, Promising Weightlifter of DPRK
articles.content:
Han Jong Sim, Promising Weightlifter of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Han Jong Sim of the sports team of the February 8 Vinalon Complex in the DPRK is in the limelight of the weightlifting circles.
					 The teenage weightlifter came first in the women's 48 kg category of the 2017 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships held in April by snatching 79 kg and jerking 102 kg, 181 kg in total.
					
					 She began to learn weightlifting at the age of 11 and retained the national championship in the women's 38 kg category three years later by renewing national records in snatching, jerking and total.
					
					 Since then, she has showed good results in various domestic tournaments, highly appreciated as a promising weightlifter among sports experts and fans.
					
					 Rim Jong Sim, a twice Olympic gold medalist, Kim Kuk Hyang, an Olympic silver medalist, and Rim Un Sim, a world junior champion, also distinguished themselves at the world juvenile weightlifting championships.
					
					 Han is now putting spurs to training in order to glorify the honor of the country with more gold medals.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Force Serves as Sure Guarantee for Global Peace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Force Serves as Sure Guarantee for Global Peace: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article that the DPRK's access to treasured nuclear sword for self-defence provided a sure guarantee for peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's self-reliant nuclear force serves as sure guarantee and absolute strength for peace of the Korean peninsula and the world.
					
					 The U.S. is making desperate efforts to daringly remove the self-defensive nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, labeling it as "biggest threat to peace". But, it is no more than a shameless logic making profound confusing of right and wrong and a gangster-like deed aimed to justify its crimes of wantonly disturbing the peace on the peninsula till now.
					
					 The DPRK, aware of its sacred mission to defend peace, will turn out highly precise and diversified nuclear weapons and striking means in a larger quantity until the U.S. and its vassal forces make a proper choice.
					
					 The DPRK would be not disarmed, easing tensions by the rhetoric of the most shameless aggressor and chief criminal of harassing the global peace and its army and people would not step back from the way of bolstering up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence, taken in by such cynical ploy.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should come to their senses by the successful test-fires of the DPRK's powerful strategic weapons, a striking demonstration of the invincible might and inexhaustible potentials of Juche Korea and refrain from resorting to the hopeless military adventure.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Aggressive Nature of U.S. Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Aggressive Nature of U.S. Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. Carl Vinson and Ronald Reagan nuclear carrier strike groups staged joint military exercises in the East Sea of Korea. It is the first time that the two nuclear carrier strike groups were involved in the exercises at the same time.
					 The U.S. overtly trumpeted that this was a strong warning to the DPRK.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Friday says that the U.S. seeks to put its dangerous scenario for military attack on the DPRK into practice.
					
					 The U.S. is wielding an olive branch symbolic of peace under the cloak of diplomatic solution but it is nothing but a fake, the daily notes, and goes on:
					
					 The aggressive nature of the new policy toward the DPRK, adopted by the Trump administration, has been totally brought to light.
					
					 As any sanctions, pressure and military blackmail against the DPRK do not work on the DPRK, the U.S. is turning to pre-emptive attack, the last resort.
					
					 The "4-point keynote" of the Trump administration's new DPRK policy is an arrant and deceptive guile, and its true essence is to ignite a nuclear war by sending such strategic assets as nuclear carrier strike groups to south Korea and its surrounding waters.
					
					 The U.S. attains its aggressive aims by flailing a club after slackening the opponent's vigilance, using diplomatic solution as bait. This is a cynical ploy employed by the U.S. from long ago.
					
					 The U.S. should know clearly that the DPRK has never begged peace from anyone but protected the dignity of the country and sovereignty of the nation and peace by its own strength.
					
					 We do not pin any hope on the diplomatic solution and peace touted by the U.S.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Conservatives Inciting North-South Confrontation
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Conservatives Inciting North-South Confrontation
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The "Liberal Korea Party" and other conservatives of south Korea turned the recent "National Assembly" confirmation hearing into a theatre for confrontation with the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary that their racket was aimed to justify the thrice-cursed crimes perpetrated by them, together with traitor Park Geun Hye, during her tenure and make the present "government" repeat those crimes.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The remnants of the history incite the north-south confrontation even at the "National Assembly" without feeling guilty conscience. It is an act of treachery and anti-reunification crime swimming against the public mindset.
					
					 All Koreans desire the improved north-south relations, and this is the irrepressible demand of the public. People's mindset represents the will of Heaven and those going against the mindset are bound to be punished by Heaven.
					
					 No matter how frantically the conservative group may run to give vent to their anger for being ousted from power, such action will get them nowhere and precipitate their final dooms only.
					
					 It is the south Korean people's mindset that steers the trend of the times as shown by the victorious candlelight resistance.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Vassal Forces' "Sanctions" on DPRK Will Bring Only Disgrace and Ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Vassal Forces' "Sanctions" on DPRK Will Bring Only Disgrace and Ruin to Them: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its vassal forces have gone desperate in their bid to apply sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					 Making public "independent sanctions" on the DPRK, the U.S. included businesses and individuals of the third country it believed to have links with the DPRK in the list of "secondary sanctions". And on June 3 it instigated the UN Security Council to cook up another "sanctions resolution" over the ballistic rocket launch of the DPRK.
					
					 U.S. Defence Secretary Mattis, at the 16th Asian Security Council session, bluffed that the U.S. would "continue diplomatic and economic pressure on north Korea until it gives up its nuclear program", saying "north Korea's nuclear and missiles are an evident and substantial danger and challenge to the whole world."
					
					 The U.S. sustained "sanctions" moves against the DPRK are vicious hostility aimed to prevent the latter from bolstering its nuclear force, disarm it and strangle its economy.
					
					 The reason that the U.S. is putting "sanctions" on the DPRK is not because of nuclear weapons and missiles. It is because the DPRK, which has towered tall as the fortress of socialism in the East, is proving the inevitability of the ruin of capitalism and putting a brake in the U.S. strategy for world domination.
					
					 The UN is not U.S. Congress and the U.S. intent can not be that of the former. Neither the UN Charter nor international code include any article stipulating the application of differing obligations and rights to big countries and small countries or any item investing the U.S. with special position.
					
					 As in the past, the recent "sanctions resolution" is for the U.S. as it was cooked up by the forces, pursuant to its high-handed and arbitrary practices, at the end of dirty bargaining.
					
					 Those who spearheaded the "sanctions resolution" would be greatly mistaken if they think they can delay or check even a bit the DPRK's nuclear development.
					
					 "Sanctions" will not work on the DPRK which is advancing with self-development as inexhaustible motive force with a firm hold on Juche in ideology, independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence as its invincible strategic line.
					
					 Self-development by which we create everything required with our own efforts and technology and our own resources is the fundamental principle inherent in our national economy.
					
					 No wonder the DPRK's economy is making rapid progress, not stagnation and doldrums as wished by the enemies, despite the consecutive application of vicious "sanctions resolutions" by the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 Big countries claiming to be a nuclear power undermine the traditional fraternal relations, chiming in with the U.S. sanctions moves. This grim reality today clearly proves that the only force for averting nuclear disaster on the Korean peninsula and maintaining regional peace lies in the powerful military capabilities of the DPRK with the nuclear force as a pivot.
					
					 "Sanctions" against the DPRK would only reinforce the revolutionary faith and spirit of self-development of the Korean army and people thousand-fold and harden their will to counter the enemies' reactionary offensive with revolutionary one.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces may wait as long as they can for the DPRK to collapse with hope pinned on the worn-out "sanctions" racket, but it will bring only shame and disgrace.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will shatter to the smithereens the U.S. and its followers' unprecedented "sanctions" and pressure racket with the great spirit of self-development and invincible military might.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Peace against War
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Inhabitants Association for Properly Retaking U.S. Military Base in Ryongsan and the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea held a press conference outside the U.S. military base in Ryongsan of Seoul on June 7, urging the peace against war and the proper transfer of the base, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 Speakers at the conference said that there occurred pollution accident by the fuel leak from the base and serious is the issue on the environmental pollution that the area is polluted by benzene 162 times the tolerance limit.
					
					 Charging that the U.S. introduced two nuclear carrier strike groups to the East Sea to increase the danger of war by staging military drills, they stressed that only dialogue can defuse tension in the Korean peninsula and the U.S. should stop acts of threatening peace.
					
					 A press release, made public at the conference, demanded the U.S. stop large-scale war drills against the north at once, pull back various types of strategic assets from the Korean peninsula and halt the deployment of THAAD threatening the life and security of the nation.

articles.title: Removal of Graves of Traitors Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Removal of Graves of Traitors Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at Hyonchung Cemetery in Taejon on June 6 to demand the liquidation of traitors and evils, according to the south Korean online paper Thongil News.
					 Speakers at the meeting referred to the fact that the majority of graves in the cemetery are those of the persons who went against the nation and democracy.
					
					 They stressed the need to revise the law so as to remove such graves.

articles.title: Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Personages from different social circles in south Korea formed a committee for promotion of the release of prisoners of conscience on June 7, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 At a press conference in Seoul on the same day, the committee said that prisoners of conscience are those who struggled in the van to achieve the workers' rights to existence and suffered from the "Security Law" and underhand politics and those who took part in civic and social movements.
					
					 It declared the will to conduct a vigorous struggle for the release of prisoners of conscience.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party Building Exploits Praised in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party Building Exploits Praised in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on June 5 to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 June 19, 1964, is a historic day of weighty significance in the development of the WPK.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il wisely led the struggle to thoroughly arm the whole Party with the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and root out the alien ideological trends in the Party.
					
					 He also paid deep attention to the work for building the Party in keeping the requirements of the Juche idea founded by the President.
					
					 It would have been unthinkable without his wise guidance that the WPK could develop into the supreme staff of the Korean revolution which has struck its roots deep into the popular masses as now.
					
					 The WPK is the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il guiding the building of a socialist power despite all challenges.

articles.title: DPRK's Test of New-Type Anti-Air Guided Weapon System Hailed in Nepal
articles.content:
DPRK's Test of New-Type Anti-Air Guided Weapon System Hailed in Nepal
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese newspaper Arpan on June 2 carried a statement of Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, hailing the DPRK's successful test of new-type anti-aircraft guided weapon system.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The test-fire of new-type anti-aircraft guided weapon system, organized by the Academy of National Defence Science, was successfully conducted in the presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the DPRK.
					
					 World peace is being ensured by the DPRK which has bolstered up its military capability for self-defence.
					
					 The successful rocket test-fires until now serve as great events showing the whole world that the DPRK has become a rocket power.
					
					 When the U.S. and other hostile forces were intensifying their sanctions and pressure, the DPRK made long strides under the unfurled banner of self-development and today has proudly emerged a nuclear power and a rocket power.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to Marshal Kim Jong Un who is further strengthening the DPRK into an invincible military power and reliably defending the world peace and stability.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia lanzamiento de prueba de cohete crucero tierra-mar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia lanzamiento de prueba de cohete crucero tierra-mar
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un presencio el lanzamiento de prueba de cohete crucero tierra-mar nuevamente desarrollado por la Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional.
					El proyectil deviene un medio poderoso de ataque capaz de golpear sin restriccion en la tierra a las flotillas de buques enemigos que planean el asalto militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El objetivo del presente ensayo estuvo en confirmar los datos tacticos y tecnicos y las especificaciones tecnicas del nuevo cohete y comprobar la efectividad combativa del sistema de armamento en general tales como el cohete y el camion de oruga con plataforma de lanzamiento autopropulsada.
					
					Tras estudiar en el puesto de vigilancia los datos tacticos y tecnicos del cohete, el Maximo Dirigente dio la orden de realizar el lanzamiento.
					
					Los cohetes realizaron exactamente el vuelo en circulo, detectaron y acertaron al barco simulado en el Mar Este de Corea.
					
					A traves del lanzamiento, se han confirmado las caracteristicas de salida de los cohetes desde el tubo de lanzamiento de camion de oruga, el arranque de motores y la operacion rapida del sistema de navegacion a ras de tierra. Y se han examinado la seguridad de vuelo en el sistema de larga navegacion de crucero a baja altura, la caracteristica de movilidad segun diversas aerolineas, la exactitud de la deteccion y la induccion del blanco de la cabeza teledirigida compuesta, la caracteristica de distincion a los amigos de los enemigos y la capacidad de transicion brusca cuando emprende el ataque contra el blanco.
					
					Haciendo preparaciones de disparo se han afirmado la caracteristica de movilidad del camion de oruga de lanzamiento nuevamente desarrollado, su entrada en la trinchera y los preparativos rapidos para el disparo y la confiabilidad de las operaciones del sistema de control de tiro.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente evaluo altamente las proezas de los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la Academia quienes desarrollaron el excelente cohete crucero, apreciado mucho por el partido, y ejecutaron con exito su lanzamiento.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Pyong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Jong Sik y Jong Sung Il.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana refuta los chismes de Tillerson
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana refuta los chismes de Tillerson
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por el reportero de la ACNC con respecto a que el secretario de Estado de EE.UU. volvio a soltar las locuras que inculcan el ambiente de sancion y presion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 8 la siguiente respuesta.
					Durante su visita a Nueva Zelanda, el secretario de Estado norteamericano, Tillerson, concedio el dia 6 una entrevista de prensa conjunta, ocasion en la cual disparateo que todos los paises deben unir las fuerzas para presionar a la RPDC para que esta reevalue la estrategia sobre el plan de desarrollo de armas nucleares.
					
					La presente chismografia de Tillerson no es nada mas que una barata ardid para apaciguar las criticas sobre su politica anti-RPDC que se alzan mas que nunca en el interior del pais norteamericano y recurrir a la campana de presion internacional contra el pais socialista.
					
					El pobre "caudillo de diplomacia" de EE.UU. con los sentidos lentos, cautivado de la ignorancia sobre su rival socialista, sigue hablando sobre la sancion y la presion inutiles.
					
					Aunque las autoridades de alto nivel de EE.UU., se desesperan por doblegar a la RPDC hablando ruidosamente de la sancion y presion superduras contra la RPDC, tales imprudencias les traeran solo el arruinamiento y la verguenza.
					
					Ya paso para siempre la epoca en que EE.UU. imponia de manera unilateral sus opiniones a otros paises valiendose del despotismo y arbitrariedades. Y nunca saldra con la suya en la RPDC la fanfarronada a estilo norteamericano que unicamente viola a los paises debiles.
					
					El pais norteamericano debe saber correctamente que la presion militar y los alborotos de sancion y presion sirven de fuerza motriz que impulsa a la RPDC a afilar mas los armamentos nucleares.
					
					La RPDC perfeccionara la diversificacion y el mejoramiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares hasta cuando EE.UU y las fuerzas seguidoras vuelvan en si y tomen una opcion correcta.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana ratifica la posicion de principios en reunion de la ONU
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana ratifica la posicion de principios en reunion de la ONU
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las fuerzas hostiles lanzan una brutal campana intrigante contra la RPDC en el tema de DDHH durante la 35a reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU que transcurre ahora en Ginebra, la delegacion de la RPDC expuso el dia 7 la siguiente posicion de principios:
					Cada ano, EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras escenifican en el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU la farsa de aprobacion forzada de la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC persiguiendo abiertamente la siniestra meta politica de derrocar su regimen socialista bajo el pretexto del inexistente "problema de DDHH".
					
					La "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC y el "relator especial" de la ONU sobre la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC, nombrado en virtud de ese documento, son el producto tipico de la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero en esa esfera y sigue invariable la posicion de nuestro pais de rechazarlos totalmente.
					
					La RPDC es un Estado socialista centrado en las masas populares que pone el ser humano en el centro de lo todo que esta a disposicion del hombre.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC hace ingentes esfuerzos por poner en practica su politica estatal de proteger y fomentar los DDHH de todos los habitantes que los ejercen a sus anchas. He aqui el panorama real de nuestro pais.
					
					A pesar de ese hecho, algunos paises hablan de la cooperacion con el "relator especial", lo cual deviene injustificable acto de intervencion en asuntos internos de la RPDC.
					
					Estamos cumpliendo con acciones todo lo que nos corresponde en el sector de DDHH e insistimos en la cooperacion y el dialogo para la proteccion y fomento de verdaderos derechos humanos.
					
					Nuestro pais ha ingresado a varios principales convenios internacionales de DDHH tales como las convenciones de derechos de la infancia y de eliminacion de todas formas de discriminacion contra la mujer. En particular, suscribio en noviembre del ano pasado el convenio sobre los derechos de los discapacitados.
					
					En el primer semestre del ano pasado, presentamos ante la ONU los informes sobre la ejecucion de convenciones arriba citadas e impulsamos de manera sustancial los preparativos para someterlos a la deliberacion en septiembre y noviembre de este ano.
					
					Como parte de la implementacion del convenio sobre los derechos de los discapacitados, hemos invitado en mayo pasado a la relatora especial encargada de los derechos de discapacitados del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU.
					
					Luego de un intercambio sincero y profundo de criterios sobre los problemas relativos a la implementacion de convenios, acordamos con ella seguir estrechando las relaciones de cooperacion.
					
					Hasta la Oficina de Alto Comisionado de la ONU para los Derechos Humanos evaluo positivamente el resultado de la visita a nuestro pais de la relatora especial.
					
					Rechazamos la "discusion de DDHH" y la "cooperacion", extremadamente politizadas y basadas en las "declaraciones" de los "fugitivos norcoreanos" que son criminales y desperdicios biologicos. Pero, estamos dispuestos a aceptar con gusto el dialogo y la cooperacion para la proteccion y fomento de los verdaderos derechos humanos.
					
					Para cumplir con su facultad y mision, el Consejo de DDHH debera cuestionar primero los institucionales actos de violacion de DDHH, tales como la terrible situacion de DDHH de EE.UU., violador no.1 de DDHH del mundo, y del Occidente, los tremendos crimenes del pasado de Japon y el secuestro colectivo a las ciudadanas coreanas cometido por el Sur de Corea, y tomar las medidas para corregirlos.
					
					No toleraremos nunca la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC que orquestan las fuerzas hostiles cuestionando el inexistente "problema de DDHH" y le haremos frente hasta el final con la posicion intransigente.

articles.title: Delegacion de trabajo del MINREX visita a Etiopia
articles.content:
Delegacion de trabajo del MINREX visita a Etiopia
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- La delegacion de trabajo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC, encabezada por el director Ho Yong Bok, visito recientemente a la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia.
					Durante su estancia, la delegacion coreana realizo una visita de cortesia al ministro de Estado para Asuntos Politicos del MINREX y departio por separados con el ministro de Estado de Empresas Publicas y el director general de Asia y Oceania del MINREX. 
					
					En esas ocasiones, la parte coreana reafirmo la posicion de la RPDC de seguir ampliando y desarrollando las relaciones entre los dos paises y presento los ingentes esfuerzos de la RPDC por aliviar el estado de tension en la Peninsula Coreana y mantener la paz y seguridad de la region. 
					
					Las personalidades etiopes de alto rango, incluyendo el ministro de Estado para Asuntos Politicos del MINREX, Hirut Zemene, evaluaron que a pesar de la sancion y presion superduras de las fuerzas hostiles, la RPDC registra exitos milagrosos en la lucha por defender la soberania del pais y desarrollar la economia nacional y se esfuerza mucho por preservar la paz y seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y la region. 
					
					Apuntaron que el gobierno etiope mantiene la invariable posicion de desarrollar aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises que tienen larga tradicion historica. 
					
					Ambas partes acordaron ampliar y fortalecer las relaciones bilaterales en desarrollo positivo al dinamizar el viaje reciproco de las delegaciones, los contactos, el intercambio y la cooperacion en todos los dominios como politica y economia.

articles.title: Kim Kum Hui acusa a EE.UU. de vulnerar el ecosistema del planeta
articles.content:
Kim Kum Hui acusa a EE.UU. de vulnerar el ecosistema del planeta
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- La investigadora del Centro de Estudio del Medioambiente del Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales de la RPDC, Kim Kum Hui, publico el dia 9 un articulo titulado "EE.UU. es el culpable principal de la destruccion del ecosistema del planeta".
					 Cuando crece mas que nunca la atencion mundial a la prevencion del calentamiento de la Tierra, EE.UU. incurre en la destruccion indiscriminada del medioambiente de la Tierra despreciando tal corriente de la epoca actual, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					  En la primera mitad del siglo 20, ese pais se hizo el emisor mas grande del mundo de los gases con efectos de invernadero al aplicar el modelo economico de consumo masivo y cancelacion masiva.
					
					  Despues del fin de la Guerra Fria, impuso su "modelo" de desarrollo a numerosos paises en vias de desarrollo bajo el cartel de "globalizacion" de la economia, lo cual acelero la destruccion medioambiental en escala mundial.
					
					  El volumen de emision de gases con efectos de invernadero en EE.UU. crecio mas de 16% en el periodo 1990-2005 y ocupo en 2004 el 22.1% del monto total del mundo entero.
					
					  Desde el primer uso de bombas atomicas contra la humanidad, el imperio realizo hasta principios de la decada de 1990 mas de mil pruebas nucleares que deterioraron seriamente la capa de ozono, paraguas protectora de los seres vivos del planeta.
					
					  Todo el orbe corre realmente el peligro de convertirse en el desierto de polvos radiactivos debido a la intervencion armada que lanza EE.UU. bajo el pretexto de "guerra antiterrorista".
					
					  Durante la guerra iraqui de 2003, EE.UU. uso de 100 a 200 toneladas de bombas de uranio empobrecido con consecuencias mortales para la salud del hombre y el medioambiente.
					
					  Y para atacar los blancos del "Estado Islamico", disparo en 2015 en el territorio sirio 5 mil 265 balas perforantes de calibre 30mm que contienen el uranio empobrecido.
					
					  En la guerra coreana de la decada de 1950 y en la vietnamita del proximo decenio, empleo gran cantidad de armas bioquimicas.
					
					  En el siglo 21, esta enfrascado tambien en los preparativos de guerra bioquimica que llevara el planeta al colapso.
					
					  En 2015, realizo en la base aerea norteamericana de Osan del Sur de Corea la prueba de bacilos de antracosis que tiene un poder destructivo de 95 % y causa enorme contaminacion medioambiental.
					
					  Ademas, opera por doquier del mundo los "laboratorios de biologia" que son bases de guerra bioquimica.
					
					  Se van deteriorando el suelo y agua potable debido al petroleo usado, sustancias quimicas y metales pesados y otros residuos provenientes de millares de bases e instalaciones militares norteamericanas distribuidas en mas de 140 paises y regiones del mundo. Esta polucion derivada de la hegemonia militar norteamericana es mucho mas grave que las perdidas ocasionadas por las actividades economicas del hombre.
					
					  EE.UU. multiplica su expediente criminal al estropear los esfuerzos mundiales por frenar el calentamiento de la Tierra.
					
					  Desde su llegada al poder, la administracion Trump cancelo una tras otra las medidas de control para combatir ese flagelo y el primero de junio, cometio la locura de decidir la retirada del Acuerdo de Paris.
					
					  Tal conducta de la nueva administracion norteamericana es para garantizar al maximo los intereses de los consorcios energeticos y complejos de industria belica de su pais que le concedieron el poder y le ayudan a mantenerlo.
					
					  Todos los hechos testimonian que EE.UU. es el culpable principal del calentamiento de la Tierra, que amenaza la existencia del hombre y el futuro del planeta, y el enemigo de la humanidad que busca irreparables consecuencias catastroficas al obstaculizar hasta los esfuerzos mundiales por frenar ese desastre.
					
					  Si EE.UU. sigue desafiando a la corriente de la epoca hacia la defensa del ecosistema planetario, sera condenado duro por la humanidad.
